entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hudson Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hudson Bay 12:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -24.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -27.3°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
